popularityCurve.label: on dec 1982 a small hong kong lending company global vista finance co quietly closes its doors for months it had been aggressively plunging most of its 7 million in borrowed money into the hong kong real-estate market which is now collapsing the next day crowds of depositors begin to form outside the main office of a middle-sized hong kong bank gresham bank ltd it had enjoyed a tidy business of borrowing money from bigger banks and re-lending it at high interest rates to little unregulated firms like global vista gresham was discovering that other banks were refusing to lend it any more cash
